description: Creates a new, generic service definition in the given or default project.
title: Angular Service Options Schema

___skipTests.description: When true, does not create "spec.ts" test files for the new service.

___name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the service?

___lintFix.description: When true, applies lint fixes after generating the service.

___spec.description: When true (the default), generates a  "spec.ts" test file for the new service.

___flat.description: When true (the default), creates files at the top level of the project.

___path.description: The path at which to create the service, relative to the workspace root.
